name: Flappy Boy (jellymaca)
description:
Flappy Boy is an endless runner game. Avoid the enemies to gain as many points as you can!

Credits:

Parallax background images by Vicente Nitti (vnitti)

Sprites by Pixel Frog

Background music by chiptunistchippy and Goose Ninja

Sound effects by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment Font by Nimble Beasts Collective
